name: Fran Tower Defense
description:
Thanks for checking out my game. This is basically just a badly made BTD clone, but it uses my friend's faces for assets. There are 50 rounds with ramping difficulty, and there are special enemy types that can only be destroyed using specific towers.

How to play:

  • The main objective is to prevent the enemies from reaching the end of the path
  • Place towers next to the path, which will attack the enemies
  • You will gain money by killing enemies and at the end of rounds
  • Use the money to get more towers, upgrade towers and gain abilities

 Features:

  • One level, one sandbox level
  • 6 different towers, each with upgrades
  • 2 towers have abilities that can be activated
  • Normal enemy type and two special enemy types
  • Save and loading

There's a sandbox mode, but you need to play the "Twisted Stones" level a bit to unlock it with 200 "FranBux". (You are rewarded 1 "FranBux" every round, and you get 50 FranBux for beating Round 50; they are only rewarded when you win/lose)
